transportAdvice: Charlotte has a light rail system and local bus network that connects some key areas, though coverage of tourist attractions is limited and a car is often the most practical option. Taxis and ride-hailing services are widely available, and the Uptown district is walkable for those staying centrally.

weather.description: Cool and occasionally cold with some rain and rare light snow; pack layers for variable winter days.
Still cool but with hints of early spring; rain is common and temperatures can fluctuate noticeably.
Mild and pleasant with blooming trees; expect some rainy days but generally comfortable for outdoor activities.
Warm and beautiful spring weather with occasional afternoon showers; one of the best months to visit.
Warm and increasingly humid with frequent afternoon thunderstorms; outdoor sightseeing is still very enjoyable.
Hot and humid with regular thunderstorms; plan outdoor activities for the morning to avoid afternoon heat and rain.
The hottest month with high humidity and frequent afternoon thunderstorms; stay hydrated and seek air-conditioned venues midday.
Continues hot and humid much like July; thunderstorms are common and the heat can feel intense.
Temperatures begin to ease with pleasant fall conditions emerging; occasional rain but generally a comfortable month.
Crisp and sunny fall weather with beautiful foliage; one of the most enjoyable months for exploring the city.
Cooling down with mild days and chilly nights; some rain but generally pleasant for sightseeing with lighter crowds.
Cold winter conditions with occasional frost and some rain; festive holiday atmosphere in Uptown makes it a charming time to visit.
